      • _getCss

        @RequestMapping(value="/{thirdName}/css/{cssFileName}",
                produces={"application/json","text/css"},
                method=GET)
default byte[] _getCss(@PathVariable(value="thirdName")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String thirdName,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="cssFileName")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String cssFileName,
                                                                                                                                                                     @Valid @RequestParam(value="version",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                     @Valid java.lang.String version)
                                                                                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception

        Get css file associated with Third

        Get css file associated with Third, if file exists return file (text/css) otherwise return error message (application/json)

        Parameters:
        thirdName - Name of Third to retrieve
        cssFileName - Name of stylesheet file to retrieve (w.o. suffix)
        version - Expected version of stylesheet (defaults to latest)
        Returns:
        !AUTOGENERATED!
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - !AUTOGENERATED!

      • _uploadBundle

        @RequestMapping(value="/{thirdName}",
                produces="application/json",
                consumes="multipart/form-data",
                method=POST)
default Third _uploadBundle(@PathVariable(value="thirdName")
                                                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String thirdName,
                                                                                                                                                                                            @Valid @RequestPart(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                                            @Valid org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
                                                                                                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception

        Uploads Third configuration bundle

        Uploads Third configuration bundle. Bundle is a gzipped tarball (tar.gz) containing a config.json file and resource file using the following layout: ``` └──css └──i18n │ └──en │ | └──i18n.properties │ └──fr │ | └──i18n.properties │ └... └──media │ └──sound1.wav │ └──sound2.ogg └──template │ └──en │ | └──emergency.handlebars │ | └──info.handlebars │ └──fr │ | └──emergency.handlebars │ | └──info.handlebars │ └... └──config.json ``` The config.json file contains a Third object in json notation (see [Models](#__Models))

        Parameters:
        thirdName - Name of Third to retrieve
        file - file to upload
        Returns:
        !AUTOGENERATED!
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - !AUTOGENERATED!

      • uploadBundle

        Third uploadBundle(java.lang.String thirdName,
                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
            throws java.lang.Exception

        Uploads Third configuration bundle

        Uploads Third configuration bundle. Bundle is a gzipped tarball (tar.gz) containing a config.json file and resource file using the following layout: ``` └──css └──i18n │ └──en │ | └──i18n.properties │ └──fr │ | └──i18n.properties │ └... └──media │ └──sound1.wav │ └──sound2.ogg └──template │ └──en │ | └──emergency.handlebars │ | └──info.handlebars │ └──fr │ | └──emergency.handlebars │ | └──info.handlebars │ └... └──config.json ``` The config.json file contains a Third object in json notation (see [Models](#__Models))

        Parameters:
        thirdName - Name of Third to retrieve
        file - file to upload
        Returns:
        !AUTOGENERATED!
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - !AUTOGENERATED!
